metadata.title: How to Add YouTube Chapters 2025: Timestamps Guide
metadata.description: Learn to add chapters and timestamps to YouTube videos. Improve navigation, SEO, and viewer experience.

hero.headline: How to Add Chapters to YouTube Videos
hero.subheadline: Help viewers navigate your content and boost SEO with properly formatted timestamps.

sections.content: YouTube chapters break your video into clickable sections. They improve viewer experience, increase watch time by helping people find what they need, and provide SEO benefits. Adding chapters is simple once you know the formatting requirements.

content.title: Easy Navigation
content.description: Viewers click directly to sections they need. Better user experience.

content.title: SEO Benefits
content.description: Chapters appear in Google search results as key moments. More visibility.

content.title: Watch Time
content.description: Viewers who find what they need stay longer and watch more.

sections.title: How to Add Chapters
content: Open YouTube Studio and select your video
Go to video details and scroll to description
Add timestamps in format: 0:00 Chapter Title
Each chapter must be at least 10 seconds long
Save changes and verify chapters appear

sections.title: Chapter Formatting Rules
content: Hour format: 1:00:00 for videos over an hour

faq.question: Why aren't my chapters showing?
faq.answer: Common issues: no 0:00 timestamp, fewer than 3 chapters, chapters under 10 seconds, or formatting errors. Double-check all requirements.

faq.question: Can I disable auto-generated chapters?
faq.answer: Yes. In YouTube Studio, go to video settings and uncheck 'Allow automatic chapters'. Your manual chapters will be used instead.

faq.question: Do chapters help SEO?
faq.answer: Yes. Chapters appear in Google search as key moments. Each chapter title is another opportunity for keyword relevance.

faq.question: Should I add chapters to every video?
faq.answer: For longer content (10+ minutes), yes. Short videos may not need them. Tutorial and educational content benefits most.
